snippet: A woman accused of killing six of her newborns and storing their bodies in her garage in Pleasant Grove, Utah, appears set to take a plea deal.
abstract: Court records show Megan Huntsman, accused of killing six of her newborns and putting them in her garage in Pleasant Grove, Utah, appears to ready to take plea deal on murder charges.
lead_paragraph: A woman accused of killing six of her newborns and storing their bodies in her garage in Pleasant Grove, Utah, appears set to take a plea deal.

headline.main: Utah: Plea Agreement Is Expected in the Deaths of Six Newborns
headline.print_headline: Utah: Plea Agreement Is Expected in the Deaths of Six Newborns
